mapper.insert: insert into user_toy ( user_no, toy_no, choice_type ) values ( #{userNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{toyNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{choiceType, jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.select: select count(*) from user_toy where user_no = #{userNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
